short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: If you enjoyed something or found it useful, support the creator with just a few clicks.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Online creators deserve to get direct financial support for their hard work. Fans deserve to be able to give that support quickly and easily.

Set up the Centiments extension just once, then support any creator with just two clicks whenever you are on their pages!

MORE INFORMATION:

The internet is amazing

There is so much brilliant content published online. But, all too often you can’t access it, and publishers aren’t getting paid fair amounts for their hard work. 

Centiments’ mission is to fix these problems and make online publishing work for everyone. 

When you browse, you often find the best content is locked up behind paywalls that need expensive monthly subscriptions. Or you have to deal with armies of adverts getting in your way.   

At the same time, content publishers are struggling to get paid fair amounts for their hard work. Big platforms take the majority of advertising revenue and expensive subscriptions mean that we cannot support all of the different creators we would like to.

By downloading our browser extension, you get to choose which content and creators you support in just a few clicks, paying small amounts directly to the creators of the content you want to see.

Creators get paid properly for their wonderful work and you are able to access what you want, when you want.

Join us in making the internet better!
